Question: What accolade did the movie 'Kahaani' receive at the 14th Zee Cine Awards in 2012?
Options:
A. Best Director
B. Best Film (Critics)
C. Best Actor
D. Best Screenplay

Question: What accolade did the movie 'Kahaani' receive at the 3rd ceremony of the BIG Star Entertainment Awards in 2012?
Options:
A. Best Director
B. Most Entertaining Film of the Year
C. Best Actor
D. Best Screenplay
Answer: Most Entertaining Film of the Year

Question: What accolade did the movie 'Kahaani' receive in 2012?
Options:
A. Won Best Film at the 58th Filmfare Awards
B. Nominated for Best Film at the 58th Filmfare Awards
C. Nominated for Best Director at the 58th Filmfare Awards
D. Won Best Actress at the 58th Filmfare Awards
Answer: Nominated for Best Film at the 58th Filmfare Awards

Options:
A. A. Sujoy Ghosh
B. B. Rajkumar Hirani
C. C. Anurag Kashyap
D. D. Zoya Akhtar

Question: In the movie 'Kahaani' (2012), which accolade was awarded to Vidya Balan for her performance?

A. Best Actress (Critics) at the 14th Zee Cine Awards
B. Best Supporting Actress at the Filmfare Awards

Options:
